page.title: 10Gymkhana games.
page.content: Gymkhanas are held for horse riders everywhere in the British Isles and in many other countries.Games are played on horseback,here are some of them.{Bending}is a game where you have to ride as fast as you can, bending in and out of poles. The winner is the person who gets to the end quickest without knocking any poles down. {Gretna Green}is another game.You need two people.One on the pony and one standing at the other side of the arena.The rider rides over to the other person.The other person mounts on the pony and they ride to the finish.In the{Potato Race}you have to have a potato on a spoon and you have to ride to a bucket without dropping it.You put the potato in the bucket and ride to the finish. Sasha Bishop.
